nodes.text: Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy – A Graphic Novel

Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy – A Graphic Novel is a 208-page hardcover graphic novel adapting the events of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on April 4, 2017. The book serves as a companion to the previously released Star Wars: The Original Trilogy – A Graphic Novel. The graphic novel is set to re-released in separate editions based on the prequel trilogy films by IDW Publishing. So far, IDW has released Star Wars: The Phantom Menace Graphic Novel Adaptation, and announced Star Wars: Attack of the Clones Graphic Novel Adaptation.

Relive the beginnings of the ultimate tale of good versus evil! Join Obi-Wan Kenobi, Padmé Amidala, Yoda, Darth Maul, and the rest of the heroes and villains from the Star Wars universe in this graphic novel collection that retells the prequel trilogy: The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith. Experience the saga as you never have before!

Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith depicts Anakin Skywalker to be the one to utter the line "A partial message was intercepted in a diplomatic packet from the chairman of Utapau." However, Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy – A Graphic Novel mistakenly depicts Stass Allie as the one to have said the line.
